metadata.title: CVE-2022-23481 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: xrdp is an open source project which provides a graphical login to remotemachines using Microsoft Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP). xrdp < v0.9.21contain a Out of Bound Read in xrdp_caps_process_confirm_active() function.There are no known workarounds for this issue. Users are advised toupgrade.

criterions.comment: xrdp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
